title: Big Tech kicks off 2021 with a slump amid broader sell-off
text: Shares of the largest technology companies dipped in the first trading day of 2021, a rough start for the sector that posted big gains in 2020.

title: Big tech under pressure as New Year kicks off

title: Facebook: Buy And Hold Forever
text: The social media giant remains undervalued despite robust growth rates and being extremely profitable. Facebook's growth trajectory will be supported by increasing user numbers and monetization in developing countries as economic conditions strengthen.

title: 2 Hyper-Growth Blue Chips For A Rich Retirement
text: There is no better way to achieve your retirement dreams than with world-class companies bought at reasonable to attractive valuations and held for the long-term. Dividend growth stocks are one of the best ways to fund the prosperous retirement you deserve.
